input.sentences: the family met up at a restaraunt .
we couldnt figure out what to order .
our food was taking a long time to come .
output.sentences: We finally met the girls family.
We went to a nice Mexican restaurant.
We agreed to order an appetizer.
However, my wife mentioned she didn't like what I was going to order.
We had a little argument, but then became content with it.
